sourcesContent: import{isIOS as f}from'../../utils/platform.js';function p(){if(!f())return{};let o;return{before(){o=window.pageYOffset},after({doc:r,d:l,meta:s}){function i(e){return s.containers.flatMap(t=>t()).some(t=>t.contains(e))}l.style(r.body,"marginTop",`-${o}px`),window.scrollTo(0,0);let n=null;l.addEventListener(r,"click",e=>{if(e.target instanceof HTMLElement)try{let t=e.target.closest("a");if(!t)return;let{hash:c}=new URL(t.href),a=r.querySelector(c);a&&!i(a)&&(n=a)}catch{}},!0),l.addEventListener(r,"touchmove",e=>{e.target instanceof HTMLElement&&!i(e.target)&&e.preventDefault()},{passive:!1}),l.add(()=>{window.scrollTo(0,window.pageYOffset+o),n&&n.isConnected&&(n.scrollIntoView({block:"nearest"}),n=null)})}}}export{p as handleIOSLocking};
